body: A nearby kingdom sends an ambassador to you to negotiate an embassy (01—60), treaty (61—90), or alliance (91—100), as if using a diplomatic edict (see Special Edicts). If the GM doesn't have an appropriate kingdom in mind when this event occurs, determine the kingdom's alignment randomly; it may be hostile or friendly. The ambassador bears 1d4 BP worth of gifts for your kingdom.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Kingdom Turn Sequence/Events/Diplomatic Overture
name: Diplomatic Overture
